1.1 lbs. 		Apple Core Pokémon It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it's just an apple and nothing more.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Ripen 5 Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
1 Gluttony 3 Makes the Pokémon already eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
18 Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
36 Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
54 Seed Sower 6 Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.
72 Chlorophyll 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
90 Poison Heal 8 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
100 Harvest 7 May create another Berry after one is used.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 16 Lifelink 7 The Pokémon may restore some of its HP after making contact.
Disc 21 Poison Heal 8 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Anticipation 3 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Chlorolize 8 Normal-type moves become Grass-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Chlorophyll 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Effect Spore 7 Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
Gluttony 3 Makes the Pokémon already eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
Greenhouse 5 The Pokémon generates strong sunlight when it's hit by an attack.
Harvest 7 May create another Berry after one is used.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Liquid Ooze 3 The oozed liquid has a strong stench, which damages attackers using draining moves.
Overgrow 5 Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Power Spore 6 Amplifies the effects of all primary statuses on the field.
Primalize 8 Normal-type moves become Dragon-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Regenerator 8 Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
Ripen 5 Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
Sap Sipper 7 Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
Seed Sower 6 Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.
Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Stench 3 By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
Sweet Veil 5 Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.
Symbiosis 3 The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Weak Armor 4 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
